mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SUBJECT WHERE STATUS ='Y'

SELECT A.SUB_CODE, A.SUB_TITLE, C.DEPT_TITLE, A.SUB_DIVS, A.SUB_CREDIT, A.SUB_TIME, B.PROF_NAME FROM SUBJECT A JOIN PROFESSOR B ON A.PROF_ID=B.PROF_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON A.DEPT_CODE=C.DEPT_CODE WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY A.SUB_CODE DESC
SELECT * FROM DEPARTMENT ORDER BY DEPT_CODE

SELECT B.SUB_CODE, B.SUB_TITLE, D.DEPT_TITLE, B.SUB_DIVS, B.SUB_CREDIT, B.SUB_TIME, C.PROF_NAME FROM LECT_REGISTER A JOIN SUBJECT B ON A.SUB_CODE=B.SUB_CODE JOIN PROFESSOR C ON B.PROF_ID=C.PROF_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON B.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_CODE WHERE A.STU_ID=#{stuId} AND A.STATUS='Y'
SELECT * FROM SUBJECT A JOIN PROFESSOR B ON A.PROF_ID=B.PROF_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON A.DEPT_CODE=C.DEPT_CODE WHERE A.SUB_CODE=#{subCode} AND A.STATUS = 'Y'
